transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Hello? Nitin ji se baat ho rahi hai, Kalo ke pipes and Vikas se?
Executive: Haan boliye.
Customer: Sir good evening, Ankita baat kar rahi thi IndiaMART se, business manager Vineet ki senior manager.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: Ji, kaise hai aap sir? How are you?
Customer: Boliye madam boliye, kaam boliye.
Executive: Sir actually aapka discussion chal raha tha Ujjwal aur Vineet ji ke sath aapke services ke.
Customer: Maine maine unko strictly bola hai ki mera payment next week hota hai 15 se 20 tarikh mein. Mai tabhi payment process karaunga, tabhi order final. Unko chalu hi aaj hi karo aaj hi karo. Mai mai bola payment aap karne wale ho is company karne wali hai. Har company ki policy hoti hai na payment karne ka ek.
Executive: Sir I am sure aapne aapne koi payment ke liye request rakha hoga, kuch aapka koi aapke bhi jitna mujhe pata hai kuch prices mein aap relaxation aa rahe the. Uske liye unhone mujhse discuss kiya tha. Maybe wo is reason se aapko bol rahe the kyuki koi bhi hum request dalte hain management se approval lene ke liye sir, uska kuch certain timeline hota hai. To maybe is reason se unhone aapko bola hoga. Agar aap unhe batati ki aap abhi plan nahi kar rahe ho, abhi aapko time lagega, aap kahin se aapka bhi koi procedure hoga wo follow karoge. I am sure wo aapko fir vaisa nahi bolte.
Customer: Madam maine morning ko morning ko bol diya tha mera procedure rehta hai agle week mein payment ho jayega wo morning ko keh rahe the mai kya karu abhi.
Executive: Accha theek hai, baki aapka plan ka kya hai aap mujhe wo bata do koi baat nahi. Aap kab tak expect kar rahe ho aap ise process kara paoge?
Customer: Monday hamara meeting ho jayega usme confirm ho jayega kaunsa plan lena hai. Uske baad mujhe date pata lagegi is date ko payment ho sakta hai uske baad hum process karwa sakte hain.
Executive: To Monday jo aapka discussion rahega wo aapka management se hai decision making matlab aap khud karte hain ya aapke partners involved hain kaise rehta hai?
Customer: Mai aapko confirm karta hu.
Executive: Haan ji?
Customer: Mai Monday confirm karta hu mam aapko.
Executive: Aap mujhe Monday confirm kar paoge? Koi problem nahi hai aap mujhe Monday bataiyega to fir uske baad hi hum prices vagera pe discuss karenge. Theek hai na? Jab aapka bhi ek baar discuss ho jaye ki aap ye plan karna chah rahe ho ya kaise karoge to uske baad hi further baat karne ka fayda hai sir.
Executive: Aur baki ye IndiaMART
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needs time for payment process.

- Wants to finalize plan before payment.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the payment request process.

- Executive agreed to discuss prices after plan confirmation.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will confirm plan on Monday.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- payment, plan, discussion, confirmation
